title: Gourmet Fish Cooking
brief_description: This excellent video provides viewers with an easy to follow step by step guide to gourmet fish cooking. International chef, Peter Jarmer, passes on the tricks of the trade in selecting and filleting fish, cooking techniques and the art of exquisite presentation. Rated: G
